import {Playground, Props} from 'docz';
import Checkbox from './index.js';
实现多种场景的内容单选
单独使用可以表示两种状态之间的切换。

<Playground>
  <Checkbox disabled style={{'marginLeft': '20px', 'marginRight': '20px'}}>未选中禁用状态</Checkbox>
  <Checkbox checked disabled>选中禁用状态</Checkbox>
</Playground>
适用于多个勾选框绑定到同一个数组的情景
用于表示多选框的不确定状态

{() => { const [checkAll, setcheckAll] = React.useState(false) const [cities, setcities] = React.useState(['上海', '北京', '广州', '深圳']) const [checkedCities, setcheckedCities] = React.useState(['上海', '北京']) const [isIndeterminate, setisIndeterminate] = React.useState(true) function handleCheckAllChange(checked) { setisIndeterminate(false) setcheckAll(checked) setcheckedCities(checked ? ['上海', '北京', '广州', '深圳'] : []) } function handleCheckedCitiesChange(value) { const checkedCount = value.length const citiesLength = cities.length setcheckedCities(value) setcheckAll(checkedCount === citiesLength) setisIndeterminate(checkedCount > 0 && checkedCount < citiesLength) } return (
handleCheckAllChange(true)}>全选 handleCheckedCitiesChange(value)}> { cities.map((city, index) => ) }
) }}
